original_name: The Adventures of Hero and Sidekick
plot: After successfully ridding their city of crime for the last twenty years, two middle aged superheros return to work by causing some havoc, in order to renew their health care benefits.
plot_en: After successfully ridding their city of crime for the last twenty years, two middle aged superheros return to work by causing some havoc, in order to renew their health care benefits.
plot_es: After successfully ridding their city of crime for the last twenty years, two middle aged superheros return to work by causing some havoc, in order to renew their health care benefits.
title: The Adventures of Hero and Sidekick
